thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Jonathan McPhail
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Jonathan McPhail

author: Jonathan McPhail
title: Jonathan McPhail
text: I used it to visit spots in the cities and then to move around to many different cities, even going all the way down to Kagoshima, and then back up to Tokyo. It is a great system that the JR pass gives you access to and I'd recommend it to anyone going to Japan
